TEXT.TITLE: TAIWAN TO TENDER FOR 27,000 TONNES U.S. SOYBEANS
TEXT.BODY: The joint committee of Taiwan's soybean importers will tender March 12 for a 27,000 tonne cargo of U.S. Soybeans for March 20 to April 5 delivery, a committee spokesman told Reuters. Taiwan's soybean imports in calendar 1987 are provisionally set at 1.81 mln tonnes compared with a revised 1.74 mln tonnes imported last year. The 1.74 mln tonne figure was revised from 1.76 mln tonnes. Taiwan imports all its soybeans from the United States. REUTER
